DOC.brief_summary: Randomized , double-blind , double-dummy , 12-week , active-controlled study pitavastatin 4 mg daily ( QD ) vs. pravastatin 40 mg daily ( QD ) subject primary hyperlipidemia mixed dyslipidemia .
DOC.brief_title: Prevail-Us : A Study Of Pitavastatin 4 mg Vs. Pravastatin 40 mg In Patients With Primary Hyperlipidemia Or Mixed Dyslipidemia
DOC.criteria: Male female subject primary hypercholesterolemia mixed dyslipidemia ≥18 ≤80 year age time consent Plasma Lowdensity lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDLC ) ≥130 milligram per deciliter ( mg/dL ) ≤220 mg/dL triglyceride ( TG ) level ≤400 mg/dL Homozygous familial hypercholesterolemia Any condition may cause secondary dyslipidemia Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus
